suppress.notes: snake yaml medium issue, No patch available yet to fix this

Issue is in spring-web and will only be fixed by Spring in their next major release. So suppressing it for the spring-framework components other than spring-web. https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-framework/issues/25379 (deprecation only in current 5.x versions) https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-framework/commit/5822f1bf85b94fd15f9829914b065b1c61910c7d (removal in 6.0.0-M1)
